thread.title: Kidney transplant patients struggle in Venezuela

title: Kidney transplant patients struggle in Venezuela
text:
Kidney transplant patients struggle in Venezuela 7:45pm IST - 02:17 
Venezuela’s roughly 3,500 kidney transplant recipients are struggling to maintain their health - with resources and materials are sorely lacking in the country's crumbling healthcare system. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
